entry.title: HOWTO
entry.content: How to enable your nook to install market applications

entry.title: nookLauncher
entry.content: A replacement app launcher for the Nook. 0.1.0 has option to add sub-folder, support for custom icons.

entry.title: nookBrowser
entry.content: nook-tweaked browser version 0.0.9 - added on 02/12/10.

entry.title: nookLibrary
entry.content: Browse, sort and search books on the Nook. version 0.1.3 - has archive/delete options for BN Books, view by folder,tags, improved cover flow and bug fixes.

entry.title: nookWifiLocker
entry.content: Simple app to keep Wifi locked. Useful for running apps like pandora, debugging, vnc. Version 0.0.3 - option to stop/start adbd. Added on 03/14/10. Version 0.0.4 - option to stop/start cell radio. Added on 07/19/10.

entry.title: nookFileManager
entry.content: File manager app - access sdcard folders and network shares.

entry.title: Trook craftycoder 1.4
entry.content: Trook, a Stanza/OPDS catalog reader, feed reader and local book browser app. Version 1.0 - Calibre, Authenticated Feeds Version 1.1 - Wifi Lock released return to Launcher Version 1.2 - Pause at startup fixed Version 1.3 - Major improvement in calibre2opds consumption. Version 1.4 - Bug fix while rendering web feeds.

entry.title: Twook
entry.content: Twitter client for the Nook

entry.title: nookMedia
entry.content: Music player for nook

entry.title: nookCalculator
entry.content: Simple calculator for the Nook

entry.title: nookMarket
entry.content: Lists available apps for Nook.Provides version details for the apps,allow you to install,uninstall and upgrade.

entry.title: nooklets
entry.content: Nooklets is an application that creates a container to run HTML/Javascript apps (called nooklets.) Rev 4 is an unofficial version and not compatible with the old one. Uninstall the old version by long-pressing on the icon or from appManager and then install this.

entry.title: APDFViewer
entry.content: PDFViewer with ability to view pages in landscape mode and zoom. Version 3 - fixed some pdf display issues.

entry.title: NookAppMan
entry.content: Launch and uninstall applications

entry.title: Google Reader
entry.content: App to read Google Reader feeds. Check out http://nookdevs.com/GReader for settings info.

entry.title: Task Manager
entry.content: Nook Task Manager allows you to kill bothersome apps. Version 0.0.3 - Implement 1 button quick kill Version 0.0.2 - Added process filtering, uses app's icon if available. Version 0.0.1 - Initial Release

entry.title: mynook.ru Launcher
entry.content: mynook.ru Launcher,FBReader and other apps.

entry.title: nookNotes
entry.content: Simple note-taking application. Notes are made up of individual items which can optionally be check-marked.

entry.title: nooklet apps
entry.content: Nooklet javascript apps for nook.

entry.title: FileSelector
entry.content: File Selector utility. Used by some nook apps to select files to open.

entry.title: nookCrossWord
entry.content: CrossWord player. Requires you to install FileSelector, too! Puzzles not included; you must download them from the internet.

entry.title: nookMines
entry.content: A well-known logic game.

entry.title: nookSync
entry.content: App used by nookLibrary to archive/delete BN books. 1.0 version was not working in many cases and 1.1 fixes the problem.
